players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Be careful, Bob. I know you're the detective and I'm keeping an eye on you."
Bob: "I've found out that Alice is the mafioso. Keep an eye on her."
Charlie: "I'm still the villager, and I haven't found out who the mafioso is. Bob's accusation against Alice seems suspicious, so I'll keep an eye on both of them."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
